p: All animal procedures were carried out in accordance with relevant national and international guidelines and according to the animal protocol approved by the Garvan/St Vincent's Animal Ethics Committee (Animal ethics number 11/46). M6-Ctrl or M6-Hh (0.75×10 6 cells/10 μL) and MDA-MB-231 (1×10 6 cells/10 μL) transplants were carried out by surgical injection via direct visualization into the fourth mammary fat pads of pre-pubescent Rag −/ − and NOD-scid IL2rγnull (NSG) mice, respectively.
